claims: Hamas announced the start of a large military operation
militants fired thousands of rockets at Israel
Hundreds of civilians were killed in Kibbutz Kissufim
Terrorists engaged in combat against armed local defenders
Foreign workers were employed in Kibbutzes throughout the region
IDF soldiers were authorized to attack a residential building where hostages were being held
An Egyptian official said warnings about an escalating situation were not heeded
Netanyahu denied receiving prior warning of attacks
